name: Subzero
shortDescription: SubZero provides dead easy Hazelcast – Kryo integration. No coding required.
longDescription: SubZero provides dead easy Hazelcast – Kryo integration. No coding required. Kryo is a popular serialization library. It’s super-fast yet easy-to-use. It does not pollute your domain model and it can even serialize classes that are not marked as Serializable.  Copy and paste the following snippet into your build:
